Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.trivial

Trivial clustering algorithms: all in one, no clusters, label clusterings These methods are mostly useful for providing a reference result in evaluation.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
ByLabelClustering Pseudo clustering using labels.
ByLabelClustering.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
ByLabelHierarchicalClustering Pseudo clustering using labels.
TrivialAllInOne Trivial pseudo-clustering that just considers all points to be one big cluster.
TrivialAllNoise Trivial pseudo-clustering that just considers all points to be noise.
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.trivial Description

Trivial clustering algorithms: all in one, no clusters, label clusterings

These methods are mostly useful for providing a reference result in evaluation.
